third_party/closure/goog/loremipsum/text/loremipsum.js

3/**
4 * @fileoverview A generator of lorem ipsum text based on the python
5 * implementation at http://code.google.com/p/lorem-ipsum-generator/.
6 *
7 */
8
9goog.provide('goog.text.LoremIpsum');
10
11goog.require('goog.array');
12goog.require('goog.math');
13goog.require('goog.string');
14goog.require('goog.structs.Map');
15goog.require('goog.structs.Set');
16
17
18/**
19 * Generates random strings of "lorem ipsum" text, based on the word
20 * distribution of a sample text, using the words in a dictionary.
21 * @constructor
22 */
23goog.text.LoremIpsum = function() {
24 this.generateChains_(this.sample_);
25 this.generateStatistics_(this.sample_);
26
27 this.initializeDictionary_(this.dictionary_);
28};
29
30
31/**
32 * Delimiters that end sentences.
33 * @type {Array<string>}
34 * @private
35 */
36goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_SENTENCES_ = ['.', '?', '!'];
37
38
39/**
40 * Regular expression for spliting a text into sentences.
41 * @type {RegExp}
42 * @private
43 */
44goog.text.LoremIpsum.SENTENCE_SPLIT_REGEX_ = /[\.\?\!]/;
45
46
47/**
48 * Delimiters that end words.
49 * @type {Array<string>}
50 * @private
51 */
52goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_WORDS_ = [',', '.', '?', '!'];
53
54
55/**
56 * Regular expression for spliting text into words.
57 * @type {RegExp}
58 * @private
59 */
60goog.text.LoremIpsum.WORD_SPLIT_REGEX_ = /\s/;
61
62
63/**
64 * Words that can be used in the generated output.
65 * Maps a word-length to a list of words of that length.
66 * @type {goog.structs.Map}
67 * @private
68 */
69goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.words_;
70
71
72/**
73 * Chains of three words that appear in the sample text
74 * Maps a pair of word-lengths to a third word-length and an optional
75 * piece of trailing punctuation (for example, a period, comma, etc.).
76 * @type {goog.structs.Map}
77 * @private
78 */
79goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.chains_;
80
81
82/**
83 * Pairs of word-lengths that can appear at the beginning of sentences.
84 * @type {Array}
85 */
86goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.starts_;
87
88
89/**
90 * Averange sentence length in words.
91 * @type {number}
92 * @private
93 */
94goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.sentenceMean_;
95
96
97/**
98 * Sigma (sqrt of variance) for the sentence length in words.
99 * @type {number}
100 * @private
101 */
102goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.sentenceSigma_;
103
104
105/**
106 * Averange paragraph length in sentences.
107 * @type {number}
108 * @private
109 */
110goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.paragraphMean_;
111
112
113/**
114 * Sigma (sqrt of variance) for the paragraph length in sentences.
115 * @type {number}
116 * @private
117 */
118goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.paragraphSigma_;
119
120
121/**
122 * Generates the chains and starts values required for sentence generation.
123 * @param {string} sample The same text.
124 * @private
125 */
126goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateChains_ = function(sample) {
127 var words = goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_(sample);
128 var wordInfo = goog.array.map(words, goog.text.LoremIpsum.getWordInfo_);
129
130 var previous = [0, 0];
131 var previousKey = previous.join('-');
132 var chains = new goog.structs.Map();
133 var starts = [previousKey];
134 var chainKeys = {};
135
136 goog.array.forEach(wordInfo, function(pair) {
137 var chain = chains.get(previousKey);
138 if (chain) {
139 chain.push(pair);
140 } else {
141 chain = [pair];
142 chains.set(previousKey, chain);
143 }
144
145 if (goog.array.contains(
146 goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_SENTENCES_, pair[1])) {
147 starts.push(previousKey);
148 }
149 chainKeys[previousKey] = previous;
150 previous = [previous[1], pair[0]];
151 previousKey = previous.join('-');
152 });
153
154 if (chains.getCount() > 0) {
155 this.chains_ = chains;
156 this.starts_ = starts;
157 this.chainKeys_ = chainKeys;
158 } else {
159 throw Error('Could not generate chains from sample text.');
160 }
161};
162
163
164/**
165 * Calculates the mean and standard deviation of sentence and paragraph lengths.
166 * @param {string} sample The same text.
167 * @private
168 */
169goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateStatistics_ = function(sample) {
170 this.generateSentenceStatistics_(sample);
171 this.generateParagraphStatistics_(sample);
172};
173
174
175/**
176 * Calculates the mean and standard deviation of the lengths of sentences
177 * (in words) in a sample text.
178 * @param {string} sample The same text.
179 * @private
180 */
181goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateSentenceStatistics_ = function(sample) {
182 var sentences = goog.array.filter(
183 goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitSentences_(sample),
184 goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_);
185
186 var sentenceLengths = goog.array.map(
187 goog.array.map(sentences, goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_),
188 goog.text.LoremIpsum.arrayLength_);
189 this.sentenceMean_ = goog.math.average.apply(null, sentenceLengths);
190 this.sentenceSigma_ = goog.math.standardDeviation.apply(
191 null, sentenceLengths);
192};
193
194
195/**
196 * Calculates the mean and standard deviation of the lengths of paragraphs
197 * (in sentences) in a sample text.
198 * @param {string} sample The same text.
199 * @private
200 */
201goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateParagraphStatistics_ = function(sample) {
202 var paragraphs = goog.array.filter(
203 goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitParagraphs_(sample),
204 goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_);
205
206 var paragraphLengths = goog.array.map(
207 goog.array.map(paragraphs, goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitSentences_),
208 goog.text.LoremIpsum.arrayLength_);
209
210 this.paragraphMean_ = goog.math.average.apply(null, paragraphLengths);
211 this.paragraphSigma_ = goog.math.standardDeviation.apply(
212 null, paragraphLengths);
213};
214
215
216/**
217 * Sets the generator to use a given selection of words for generating
218 * sentences with.
219 * @param {string} dictionary The dictionary to use.
220 */
221goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.initializeDictionary_ = function(dictionary) {
222 var dictionaryWords = goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_(dictionary);
223
224 var words = new goog.structs.Map();
225 goog.array.forEach(dictionaryWords, function(word) {
226 var set = words.get(word.length);
227 if (!set) {
228 set = new goog.structs.Set();
229 words.set(word.length, set);
230 }
231 set.add(word);
232 });
233
234 this.words_ = words;
235};
236
237
238/**
239 * Picks a random starting chain.
240 * @return {Array<string>} The starting key.
241 * @private
242 */
243goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.chooseRandomStart_ = function() {
244 var key = goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomChoice_(this.starts_);
245 return this.chainKeys_[key];
246};
247
248
249/**
250 * Generates a single sentence, of random length.
251 * @param {boolean} opt_startWithLorem Whether to start the setnence with the
252 * standard "Lorem ipsum..." first sentence.
253 * @return {string} The generated sentence.
254 */
255goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateSentence = function(opt_startWithLorem) {
256 if (this.chains_.getCount() == 0 || this.starts_.length == 0) {
257 throw Error('No chains created');
258 }
259
260 if (this.words_.getCount() == 0) {
261 throw Error('No dictionary');
262 }
263
264 // The length of the sentence is a normally distributed random variable.
265 var sentenceLength = goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomNormal_(
266 this.sentenceMean_, this.sentenceSigma_)
267 sentenceLength = Math.max(Math.floor(sentenceLength), 1);
268
269 var wordDelimiter = ''; // Defined here in case while loop doesn't run
270
271 // Start the sentence with "Lorem ipsum...", if desired
272 var sentence;
273 if (opt_startWithLorem) {
274 var lorem = 'lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteteur adipiscing elit';
275 sentence = goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_(lorem);
276 if (sentence.length > sentenceLength) {
277 sentence.length = sentenceLength;
278 }
279 var lastWord = sentence[sentence.length - 1];
280 var lastChar = lastWord.substring(lastWord.length - 1);
281 if (goog.array.contains(goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_WORDS_, lastChar)) {
282 wordDelimiter = lastChar;
283 }
284 } else {
285 sentence = [];
286 }
287
288 var previous = [];
289 var previousKey = '';
290 // Generate a sentence from the "chains"
291 while (sentence.length < sentenceLength) {
292 // If the current starting point is invalid, choose another randomly
293 if (!this.chains_.containsKey(previousKey)) {
294 previous = this.chooseRandomStart_();
295 previousKey = previous.join('-');
296 }
297
298 // Choose the next "chain" to go to. This determines the next word
299 // length we'll use, and whether there is e.g. a comma at the end of
300 // the word.
301 var chain = /** @type {Array} */ (goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomChoice_(
302 /** @type {Array} */ (this.chains_.get(previousKey))));
303 var wordLength = chain[0];
304
305 // If the word delimiter contained in the chain is also a sentence
306 // delimiter, then we don't include it because we don't want the
307 // sentence to end prematurely (we want the length to match the
308 // sentence_length value).
309 //debugger;
310 if (goog.array.contains(goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_SENTENCES_,
311 chain[1])) {
312 wordDelimiter = '';
313 } else {
314 wordDelimiter = chain[1];
315 }
316
317 // Choose a word randomly that matches (or closely matches) the
318 // length we're after.
319 var closestLength = goog.text.LoremIpsum.chooseClosest(
320 this.words_.getKeys(), wordLength);
321 var word = goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomChoice_(
322 this.words_.get(closestLength).getValues());
323
324 sentence.push(word + wordDelimiter);
325 previous = [previous[1], wordLength];
326 previousKey = previous.join('-');
327 }
328
329 // Finish the sentence off with capitalisation, a period and
330 // form it into a string
331 sentence = sentence.join(' ');
332 sentence = sentence.slice(0, 1).toUpperCase() + sentence.slice(1);
333 if (sentence.substring(sentence.length - 1) == wordDelimiter) {
334 sentence = sentence.slice(0, sentence.length - 1);
335 }
336 return sentence + '.';
337};
338
339/**
340 * Generates a single lorem ipsum paragraph, of random length.
341 * @param {boolean} opt_startWithLorem Whether to start the sentence with the
342 * standard "Lorem ipsum..." first sentence.
343 * @return {string} The generated sentence.
344 */
345goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateParagraph = function(
346 opt_startWithLorem) {
347 // The length of the paragraph is a normally distributed random variable.
348 var paragraphLength = goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomNormal_(
349 this.paragraphMean_, this.paragraphSigma_);
350 paragraphLength = Math.max(Math.floor(paragraphLength), 1);
351
352 // Construct a paragraph from a number of sentences.
353 var paragraph = []
354 var startWithLorem = opt_startWithLorem;
355 while (paragraph.length < paragraphLength) {
356 var sentence = this.generateSentence(startWithLorem);
357 paragraph.push(sentence);
358 startWithLorem = false;
359 }
360
361 // Form the paragraph into a string.
362 paragraph = paragraph.join(' ')
363 return paragraph
364};
365
366
367/**
368 * Splits a piece of text into paragraphs.
369 * @param {string} text The text to split.
370 * @return {Array<string>} An array of paragraphs.
371 * @private
372 */
373goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitParagraphs_ = function(text) {
374 return text.split('\n')
375};
376
377
378/**
379 * Splits a piece of text into sentences.
380 * @param {string} text The text to split.
381 * @return {Array<string>} An array of sentences.
382 * @private
383 */
384goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitSentences_ = function(text) {
385 return goog.array.filter(
386 text.split(goog.text.LoremIpsum.SENTENCE_SPLIT_REGEX_),
387 goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_);
388};
389
390
391/**
392 * Splits a piece of text into words..
393 * @param {string} text The text to split.
394 * @return {Array<string>} An array of words.
395 * @private
396 */
397goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_ = function(text) {
398 return goog.array.filter(
399 text.split(goog.text.LoremIpsum.WORD_SPLIT_REGEX_),
400 goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_);
401};
402
403
404/**
405 * Returns the text is not empty or just whitespace.
406 * @param {string} text The text to check.
407 * @return {boolean} Whether the text is nether empty nor whitespace.
408 * @private
409 */
410goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_ = function(text) {
411 return goog.string.trim(text).length > 0;
412};
413
414
415/**
416 * Returns the length of an array. Written as a function so it can be used
417 * as a function parameter.
418 * @param {Array} array The array to check.
419 * @return {number} The length of the array.
420 */
421goog.text.LoremIpsum.arrayLength_ = function(array) {
422 return array.length;
423};
424
425
426/**
427 * Find the number in the list of values that is closest to the target.
428 * @param {Array<number>} values The values.
429 * @param {number} target The target value.
430 * @return {number} The closest value.
431 */
432goog.text.LoremIpsum.chooseClosest = function(values, target) {
433 var closest = values[0];
434 goog.array.forEach(values, function(value) {
435 if (Math.abs(target - value) < Math.abs(target - closest)) {
436 closest = value;
437 }
438 });
439
440 return closest;
441};
442
443/**
444 * Gets info about a word used as part of the lorem ipsum algorithm.
445 * @param {string} word The word to check.
446 * @return {Array} A two element array. The first element is the size of the
447 * word. The second element is the delimter used in the word.
448 * @private
449 */
450goog.text.LoremIpsum.getWordInfo_ = function(word) {
451 var ret;
452 goog.array.some(goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_WORDS_,
453 function (delimiter) {
454 if (goog.string.endsWith(word, delimiter)) {
455 ret = [word.length - delimiter.length, delimiter];
456 return true;
457 }
458 return false;
459 }
460 );
461 return ret || [word.length, ''];
462};
463
464
465/**
466 * Constant used for {@link #randomNormal_}.
467 * @type {number}
468 * @private
469 */
470goog.text.LoremIpsum.NV_MAGICCONST_ = 4 * Math.exp(-0.5) / Math.sqrt(2.0);
471
472
473/**
474 * Generates a random number for a normal distribution with the specified
475 * mean and sigma.
476 * @param {number} mu The mean of the distribution.
477 * @param {number} sigma The sigma of the distribution.
478 * @private
479 */
480goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomNormal_ = function(mu, sigma) {
481 while (true) {
482 var u1 = Math.random();
483 var u2 = 1.0 - Math.random();
484 var z = goog.text.LoremIpsum.NV_MAGICCONST_ * (u1 - 0.5) / u2;
485 var zz = z * z / 4.0;
486 if (zz <= -Math.log(u2)) {
487 break;
488 }
489 }
490 return mu + z * sigma;
491};
492
493
494/**
495 * Picks a random element of the array.
496 * @param {Array} array The array to pick from.
497 * @return {*} An element from the array.
498 */
499goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomChoice_ = function(array) {
500 return array[goog.math.randomInt(array.length)];
501};
502
